title: Baidu's Hong Kong shares rise on reports of Apple partnership
text: ** Hong Kong-listed shares of Baidu Inc BIDU up 5.1% at HK$103.2 in morning trade, after rising as much as n7% earlier in the day ** Baidu will provide artificial intelligence services to Apple Inc's new products this year including iPhone16, Mac series and ios 18, cailianshe reported, citing sources ** Baidu posts its biggest one-day gain in two months, barring an afternoon correction ** At current price, co stock is trading at 10x next year's expected earnings ** Analysts on avg expect Baidu Inc's revenue to rise 7.3% to HK$145.4 billion in its current fiscal year after rising 10% to HK$135.51 billion in the previous fiscal year ** Analysts on an avg expect Baidu Inc's net income to rise 5.5% to HK$27.54 billion in the current fiscal year, after rising 39.2% to HK$26.1 billion in its previous year ($1 = 7.8206 Hong Kong dollars) Traders and investors use our platform.
